TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RuleExpressionInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: An instance of this class is returned by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.IRuleExpression.Validate%2A> method of an expression.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionInfo.ExpressionType%2A> property on RuleExpressionInfo provides the return type of the expression. For example, a binary expression, when evaluated, has a return type of Boolean; or, an expression that accesses a property might return an integer type.
The information in the RuleExpressionInfo can be used to validate the use of the expression. For example, a greater-than test cannot be used to compare two expressions if either returns a Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type expressionType) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the type of the expression.
